snippet: Ex-French President Nicolas Sarkozy and former prime minister Alain Juppe discussed the situation regarding embattled presidential candidate Francois Fillon on Saturday night, a source close their Republican party said....

headline.main: Notable Career Ends With Sentencing in United Airlines Case
headline.print_headline: Notable Career Ends With Sentencing in United Airlines Case

lead_paragraph: Ex-French President Nicolas Sarkozy and former prime minister Alain Juppe discussed the situation regarding embattled presidential candidate Francois Fillon on Saturday night, a source close their Republican party said.
